/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their architecture hinting at the rich history and culture of the city. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures and adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.
